body: i'm thankful that though i feel like hot garbage because i couldn't fall asleep last night and because during the period where i was asleep managed to pull something painful in my neck and shoulder, i did at least get some sleep. i'm thankful for advil. i'm thankful that this afternoon i have my rescheduled psych appointment, which i am absolutely not going to miss like last week and where hopefully the doctor will prescribe some new things that will make me feel better than i do now, and i'm thankful that on my way home, i am going to stop at the grocery store and pick up some candy in case we have trick or treaters. i'm thankful that i do not have to wear a costume.
